sys_script_include.name: RegItemVarName

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_782802794786a25028da392f316d431a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1755799_edit_and.RegItemVarName</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>RegItemVarName</name><sandbox_callable>true</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var RegItemVarName = Class.create();
RegItemVarName.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getRegItemVarName: function() {
        var number = this.getParameter('sysparm_number');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
        if (gr.get('number', number)) {
            var data = {};
            var variables = gr.variables;
            
            for (var option in variables) {
                if (variables.hasOwnProperty(option)) {
                    data[option] = option;
                }
            }
            return JSON.stringify(data);
        }
        return JSON.stringify({ error: 'Request item not found' });
    },
    type: 'RegItemVarName'
});
    ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-11 03:21:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>782802794786a25028da392f316d431a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RegItemVarName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Edit and Resubmit" source="x_1755799_edit_and">2d370bf3477de61028da392f316d4377</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Edit and Resubmit">2d370bf3477de61028da392f316d4377</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_782802794786a25028da392f316d431a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-11 18:56:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
